DOC.HEADLINE: VALLEYWIDE FOCUS : DANCE SHOWS TO HELP FEED AIDS PATIENTS
DOC.TEXT: AIDS-afflicted men , women and children restricted to their Valley homes will receive a boost this weekend with the return of choreographer Doug Caldwell ' s benefit dance concert " Love Is All That Matters. " The show will generate funds for Project Angel Food , a meal-on-wheels program for those who are homebound due_to AIDS-related illnesses . " Love Is All That Matters " played to sold-out crowds in April and May . It returns with shows at the Performing Arts Center at 15934 Strathern St. , Van Nuys , on Friday and Saturday at 8 p.m. and on Sunday at 2 and 8 p.m. Tickets are $ 12 . For information , call ( 818 ) 980-3336 . ANTONIO OLIVOFUND RAISING
